nodes.text: Vor'shandi markings were painted on the members of the Lost Tribe of Sith on the planet of Kesh. The markings were made with the brown nectar of the S'rai plant. In 41 ABY, Sith Tyro Vestara Khai had vor'shandi markings painted on her arms, and markings of the dalsa flower painted on her face.
Vor'shandi markings were not permanent; they were easily smeared and came off completely with water.
